title: Mobility of soil-biodegradable nanoplastics in unsaturated porous media affected by protein-corona
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3522-3532
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00140K, Paper
Yingxue Yu, Odeta Qafoku, Libor Kovarik, Anton F. Astner, Douglas G. Hayes, Markus Flury
Soil-biodegradable plastic has been increasingly used as mulches in agriculture, which provides not only agronomical benefits but also in situ disposal and biodegradation options.
